item.title: Twisted History of Python Packaging
item.description:
Summary

Python Packaging has had a more than less than ideal evolution. This talk aims to clarify this evolution and where packaging is headed in the future.
item.dc:creator: Mahdi Yusuf

item.title: How to Make Friends and Influence Developers
item.description:
Summary

This talk will teach you how to grow a community around your project. I will be sharing interesting data points from the PyCoder's Weekly newsletter on what resonates well with developers, specifically in the Python community.
item.dc:creator: Mahdi Yusuf
